name: mad-summerbun
title: The MAD Cartographer | Summer Bundle | Battlemap Pack
description: The Summer Bundle from The MAD Cartographer, celebrating a year of Foundry battlemaps! These maps include pre-built walls, sounds, lighting and journal entries with instructions on how to use the maps. This module comes with a Scenes, Actors, Items and Journal Compendium. Elements of this pack require KayelGee's Token Attacher Module.
author: TheMADCartographer
